regions.SGS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Today I'd like to go from {{start}} to {{target}}

titleText.perfect: Perfect guess. This $t(regionName) is on the shortest route.
titleText.good: Good guess. Not the shortest route, but it's not far off.

breakdown.win:
Success! You got from {{start}} to {{end}} in $t(guess, {"count": {{numSteps}} }).
The shortest solution was $t(guess, {"count": {{minSteps}} }).
breakdown.lose:
So close. You were just $t(guess, {"count": {{numSteps}} }) from {{end}}.
Missing $t(regionName, {"count": {{numSteps}} }) 🔎: {{missingCountries}}.

The shortest solution was $t(guess, {"count": {{minSteps}} }).

playmore.title: Play more travle!
playmore.text: Play travle in France, Ireland, Italy, Moldova, Portugal, Romania, Russia, UK, Ukraine, USA...!

info.title: How to Play
info.opening:
Name $t(regionName_other) to travel from the Start $t(RegionName) to the End $t(RegionName). Try to get there in as few guesses as possible.

Guess $t(regionName_other) in any order. You must name every $t(regionName) you'd pass through, so exclaves don't make new connections.

After each guess you get an emoji signaling how much the computer liked it.

emojis.perfect: Guess is optimal! You're one step closer.
emojis.good: Guess is pretty good. You're in the ball park... This $t(regionName) is close, but not on the route with the fewest guesses.
emojis.notGreat: Guess is not great. Your guess is a significant detour.
emojis.poor: There isn't even a way to get from your guess to the target $t(regionName) by land 🤦.

info.jumps: Direct jumps over water within a $t(regionName_other) are allowed - e.g. the Bosphorus in Turkey, or between the islands of Malaysia. Jumps that require you go nearer other $t(regionName_other) don't count - e.g. France <-> French Guiana or Spain <-> Ceuta/ Melilla.
info.region_colors: Guesses not connected to the Start $t(RegionName) are colored gray.
info.check_faq: Click $t(info.faq) below for more info on borders, regions and connections in the game, as well as other FAQ!
info.next_travle: A new travle is released each night at midnight, local time.
info.specials: A special challenge map is available every Saturday!
info.conclusion: travle uses: Natural Earth data, Bootstrap v5.3 for layout and UI design, d3.js for map rendering, and colours based on Gruvbox Materal.
info.translations: Thanks to those who helped with translations! Major updates: /u/Vincentvincentvince (German), Anton P (Russian), @ygorg (French). Smaller updates & corrections: /u/spamhok (Dutch), /u/polarsy (Hungarian & French), /u/IwanZamkowicz (Polish), /u/Nyght99 (Indonesian).

games.title: Travle game modes
games.subtitle: Play another mode!
games.fra: Travle France: Journey through the French regions
games.gbr: Travle UK: Explore counties in the UK
games.irl: Travle Ireland: Look around counties in Ireland
games.ita: Travle Italy: Search the Italian provinces
games.jpn: Travle Japan: Traverse the prefectures in Japan
games.rus: Travle Russia: Get between the regions of Russia
games.ukr: Travle Ukraine: Traverse the regions of Ukraine
games.usa: Travle USA: Tour the states in America
games.prt: Travle Portugal: Travel the municipalities of Portugal
games.mda: Travle Moldova: Travel the districts of Moldova
games.rou: Travle Romania: Travel the counties of Romania
games.benelux: Travle Benelux: Travel the districts of Belgium, the Netherlands and Luxembourg
games.mex: Travle Mexico: Travel the states of Mexico
games.bra: Travle Brazil: Travel the states of Brazil
games.esp: Travle Spain: Travel the regions of Spain
games.ind: Travle India: Travel the states and territories of India
